Miscellaneous Highlights: England have a dismal record against Brazil, with a win rate of just 15% in 27 meetings.
Brazil have not proven themselves as good travellers to England in the past, winning just three of their 13 matches at Wembley.
Others: The two nations have met numerous times over the years, with the first meeting being a 0-0 draw in 1958, and the most recent meeting being a 1-0 loss for England in 2024.
The two teams have also played numerous friendlies, with England winning 1-0 in 1984 and losing 1-0 in 2009.
